Feature Notes:
Fighting Style: 1 selection
Ranger Archetype: 1 selection
Exceptional Training: Can use a bonus action to command companion to Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack/Companion attacks count as magical
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast of up to CR 1/4 obeys commands and gains +4 Armor Class, attack, damage, and proficient skills and saving throws
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of FR-Savras and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; Insight; Nature; Religion; Stealth
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 5 Performance: (cha) 2
Animal Handling: (wis) 1 Intimidation: (cha) 2 Persuasion: (cha) 2
Arcana: (int) -1 Investigation: (int) -1 Religion: (int) 3
Athletics: (str) 5 Medicine: (wis) 1 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 2 Nature: (int) 3 Stealth: (dex) 5
History: (int) -1 Perception: (wis) 1 Survival: (wis) 1
Languages: Common; Elvish; Gnomish; Goblin
Skill Notes:
Favored Enemy: Has advantage on Survival to track and on Intelligence to recall info about 2 chosen creature types, and can learn any languages they speak
Hide In Plain Sight: +10 Stealth to hide using prepared camouflage; moving or taking an action or reaction ends
Natural Explorer: Doubles Proficiency on Intelligence and Wisdom skills, moves normally through difficult terrain, never becomes lost, always remains alert, can stealth alone at full speed, locates double food, and gains extra info from tracking in 3 chosen terrain types
Combat
Hit Points: 66 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+7 1+1 R25/100); Light Crossbow (+7 1d8+1 R80/320); Quarterstaff (+5 1d8+1); Unarmed (+5 1+1)

Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Mobile: Can Dash at full speed in difficult terrain/Attacking a target does not provoke an opportunity attack
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength

Save Notes: Land's Stride: Has advantage vs. impeding plants
Magic
Spell Slots: R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 2 Attack: R: 5 Spell DC: R: 13
Spells:
Alarm (R1 Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated Tiny or larger creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Animal Friendship (R1 Ench): R30' Convinces target beast that self is harmless (save Wisdom negates; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 day or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Animal Messenger (R2 Ench): R30' Tiny beast target moves to deliver a 25-word message to a described recipient for 1 day [+Level extends the duration +2 days] [R]
Barkskin (R2 Tran): Willing touched gains AC 16 for concentration up to 1 hr
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Commune With Nature (R5 Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Conjure Animals (R3 Conj): R60' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter fey spirits in beast form for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles, triples, or quadruples the number of animals at level 5, 7, or 9]
Conjure Barrage (R3 Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type damage (save Dexterity half)
Conjure Volley (R5 Conj): R150' 40' radius inflicts 8d8 HP weapon type damage (save Dexterity half)
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter fey creatures for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles or triples the number of creatures at level 6 or 8]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four arrows or crossbow bolts attack non-designated creatures within 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (save Dexterity negates), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+1 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Darkvision (R2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Daylight (R3 Evoc): R60' Target centers a 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Detect Magic (R1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Poison And Disease (R1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Find Traps (R2 Divi): R120' Reveals the presence of traps
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level increases the radius by 20']
Freedom Of Movement (R4 Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Goodberry (R1 Tran): Creates 10 berries that each heal 1 HP and provide food for 1 day
Grasping Vine (R4 Conj): R30' 30' vine pulls the target 20' each rd (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Hail Of Thorns (R1 Conj): Next successful self ranged attack inflicts 1d10 HP piercing in a 5' radius (save Dexterity half) for concentration within 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP (6d10 HP maximum)]
Hunter's Mark (R1 Divi): R90' Self gains +1d6 HP weapon damage to the target and advantage on Perception and Wisdom to locate it for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level extends the duration to 8 or 24 hr at level 3 or 5]
Jump (R1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Lesser Restoration (R2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Lightning Arrow (R3 Tran): Next self ranged weapon attack within concentration up to 1 min inflicts 8d6 HP lightning on the target (miss half) and 2d8 HP lightning to others in a 10' radius (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Locate Animals Or Plants (R2 Divi): Reveals the location within 5 miles of a specified kind of beast or plant [R]
Locate Creature (R4 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified creature or species within 1000' for concentration up to 1 hr; running water blocks
Locate Object (R2 Divi): Reveals the location of a specified object or type within 1000' for concentration up to 10 min; lead blocks
Longstrider (R1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Nondetection (R3 Abju): Willing touched or touched object gains immunity to divination for 8 hr
Pass Without Trace (R2 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for concentration up to 1 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Protection From Energy (R3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Protection From Poison (R2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Silence (R2 Illu): R120' 20' radius blocks sound for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Speak With Animals (R1 Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Speak With Plants (R3 Tran): Self can talk with and command plants for 10 min
Spike Growth (R2 Tran): R150' 20' radius becomes difficult terrain and inflicts 2d4 HP per 5' movement for concentration up to 10 min
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Swift Quiver (R5 Tran): Touched quiver dispenses ammo endlessly and allows two ranged attacks as a bonus action for concentration up to 1 min
Tree Stride (R5 Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Water Breathing (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 24 hr [R]
Water Walk (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can traverse liquids for 1 hr [R]
Wind Wall (R3 Evoc): R120' Creates a 50'x15'x1' area that inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Primeval Awareness: Can spend a spell slot to sense creatures in a 1 mile radius, or in a 6 mile radius of favored terrain, for 1 min per slot level
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the ranger spell list
